title: "Ander Egurtzegi"

I am Ander Egurtzegi, a Chargé de Recherche (tenured researcher) at the Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS) at IKER UMR-5478. I work on the typology of sound change, with a focus on Basque. My research explores phonetically-based sound change, typologically rare sound patterns, metathesis, and the reconstruction of Proto-Basque, combining historical linguistics, theoretical phonology, experimental phonetics, and contact linguistics.

Welcome to my website. Here you can find information about my publications, talks, projects, and teaching activities.
